Package ipp.estg.commands.messages

Class SendMessageCommand

java.lang.Object
ipp.estg.commands.messages.SendMessageCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand
public class SendMessageCommand extends Object implements ICommand
Command that handles sending messages to channels or users.

  • Constructor Details

    • SendMessageCommand

      public SendMessageCommand(Server server, WorkerThread workerThread, IUserRepository userRepository, IChannelRepository channelRepository, IChannelMessageRepository channelMessageRepository, IUserMessageRepository userMessageRepository, String[] inputArray, boolean isChannel)
      Constructor for the SendMessageCommand.
      Parameters:
      server - The server instance.
      workerThread - The worker thread handling the connection.
      userRepository - The user repository to fetch user data.
      channelRepository - The channel repository to fetch channel data.
      channelMessageRepository - The channel message repository to handle channel messages.
      userMessageRepository - The user message repository to handle user messages.
      inputArray - The input parameters containing message details.
      isChannel - Whether the message is being sent to a channel (true) or a user (false).

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the send message command. This method checks the sender's login status and routes the message accordingly (to a channel or a user).
      Specified by:
      execute in interface ICommand
